emails.subject: All-Hands Meeting Announcement
emails.body: Dear Team, we are holding an all-hands meeting next Wednesday at 10am in the main auditorium. Please review the agenda attached.

emails.subject: Re: All-Hands Meeting Announcement
emails.body: Looking forward to it. Will there be a virtual dial-in option?

emails.subject: Re: All-Hands Meeting Announcement
emails.body: Yes, a Zoom link will be shared shortly.

emails.subject: Reminder: All-Hands Meeting
emails.body: This is a reminder for tomorrow's meeting. Please find the dial-in information here.
